metadata.title: On-Chain Metric Tips Ethereum To Form Price Bottom Below $2,000 – Here’s Why
metadata.description: Ethereum has been a major victim of the ongoing crypto market onslaught, recording a 27.63% loss in the last month alone. The largest altcoin now trades around $2,800, representing a significant fall from the local cycle peak around $4,800. As prices continue to tumble with each new drop triggering…
